column2: We've just won a kingdom in a Crusade. We could choose to keep the kingdom for ourselves or we could give it to someone else in our family. Deus vult!
I have won this rightfully, and my house shall rule until the end of days!
I have a son who is deserving of this title.
I have a brother who is deserving of this title.
I have a close relative who is deserving of this title.
I know a distant relative who is deserving of this title.
I know a worthy Crusader who would deserve this title.

With how far removed we are from William the Conqueror, the Norman Company no longer has any loyalty to us.
With the Magyars settled in the Carpathian Basin, we can now move away from our enemies into their former territory.
